features: 【6 Levels Adjustable Dpi】SM900 is a powerful gaming mouse with excellent performance,It supports 6 levels adjustment DPI up to 12800.According user's preference setup different DPI , suitable for games, office and many occasions.

【4 Mode Switch】SM900 gaming wired mouse supports 4 modes switch, default 1 office mode and 3 gaming modes.Gaming modes need setup by macro software, according to the user's gaming preferences setup different button functions.

【Support Custom & Macro Program】SM900 lightweight gaming mouse supports macro settings, user can reset the mouse buttons, DPI,modes, lighting effects.Customize personalized gaming mouse according to user preferences.This mouse is widely supported Windows 7/8/10/XP//VISTA/MAC OS, etc, The USB interface is plug and play.

【3 Sided Honeycomb Shell design】More breathable, more sweat-absorbent and more comfortable!!!The gaming mouse is made of high quality ABS material and designed with ergonomic hollow perforated housing, Ergonomic Design reduce the weight and make the mouse more flexible and easier to be used for a long time without fatigue, and also enhance the heat dissipation features, very comfortable to use.

【14 RGB Rainbow Backlight】SM900 pc gaming mice has adjustable RGB lights that can be set to different effects according to user preferences. The brilliant lighting effects provide illumination in dark environments also increases the fun of using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This mouse is exactly what I wanted. It has been over a decade since I bought a wired mouse. I have become very disappointed with wireless mice. For no reason they just stop functioning in multiple ways. My favorite wireless mouse, that I purchased on Amazon in Jan of 2022 just stopped charging. I also thought about how annoying it’s become to stop what I’m doing to wait for the wireless mouse to charge anyway…so I thought I’d take a look at wired mice to see what’s happened with them. This one works perfectly-every function-and has SO MANY fun light options. The one filmed is my favorite. Worth every penny of the $14.23 I paid. 10 stars (I guess I should wait to see how long it stays functioning for the 10 starts. I have a feeling it will be awesome for a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The lights are bright and it’s more durable than I thought. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's awesome, so far!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First impressions:It comes in a small, minimal waste package, with simple instructions. It seems like a good size/shape for any size hand or grip preference. It's corded, so you don't need to worry about batteries or connection issues. It has preset configurations and works great right out of the box, but if you download the software for it (super fast and easy download), there are sooo many customization options. If you're into fancy customizations, you could spend a good while going through all of the little details; but, if you're like me (minimalistic and not tech savvy at all), the customizations are super simple and self-explanatory, and not necessary for use. There are six preset DPI mouse speeds (1000, 1200, 1600, 4000, 6400, 12800), but they can be individually changed and adjusted to your preferred speeds.For regular/"office" use: The lights can be turned off for a more subtle, professional look. There are mouse sensitivity, scroll speed, and double-click speed settings.For gaming: I've only used it on World of Warcraft so far. The "office" configuration and "gaming" configuration are easy to switch between (with one hold of a button), so, if you like your in-game "look speed" to be different from your typical mouse speed, that's an option. The two biggest problems I have when gaming are 1) death-gripping my controllers and mice to hard that the buttons stop working, so it's nice to have a mouse that clicks when I want it to, and 2) my hands getting so sweaty that I can't properly grip the mouse, especially when every millisecond counts (yes, queue the PVP losses and raid/mythic wipes...), so this honeycomb shell is a life-saver with its breathability, along with allowing you less slippery grip. This mouse is also super lightweight, so reaction time is way better than with other mice.Side note: If it's not gliding on your mousepad, it's probably because you haven't peeled off the clear plastic on the little pads on the underside of the mouse.All-in-all, I've only had it hooked up for a few minutes, and am still going through the customizations, but it's awesome so far!P.S. You can configure the lights to look like a Cylon from Battlestar Galactica;) (Video attached for reference.)Hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The buttons on the left are easy to touch by mistake
reviews.reviewText: It is very light and feels very comfortable in the hand. It's also ergonomically designed so I can use it for long periods of time without getting tired.The RGB lighting effect of this mouse is very cool.The button on the left is often touched by mistake at the beginning of use. But once you get used to it, it's handy to return to the page-turning buttons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Budget mouse for gaming
reviews.reviewText: Needed to replace my gaming mouse as it had been worn out after years of use. Wanted to try this one out based on the design and price. So far I can tell if feels a lot lighter than I thought it would be, which is a nice surprise. The movement seems just as good as my old, more expensive mouse, so that's a great start.
